• Resource application

• Status reporting

• Resource modifications

• Ready for deployment

• Infrastructure setup

• Bootstrap secrets

• Secret resources

• Platform components
• Monitoring
• Image updater

🌊 Wave 10
• Applications
• Workloads
• Business logic

📁 overlays/dev/
• kustomization.yaml
• blueberry-values.yaml
• Environment-specific config

📁 overlays/prod/
• kustomization.yaml
• production values
• Production config

📁 base/
• Common manifests
• Shared configurations
• Base templates

📱 blueberry
• Sync wave: 10
• Helm deployment
• Namespace: blueberry

📱 external-secrets
• Sync wave: -20
• Helm deployment
• Namespace: external-secrets

📱 gitlab-secret-resources
• Sync wave: -5
• Directory deployment
• Namespace: argocd

📱 argocd-image-updater
• Sync wave: 0
• Kustomize deployment
• Namespace: argocd

📱 blueberry-root-dev
• Environment: dev
• App-of-apps pattern
• Points to overlays/dev

📱 blueberry-root-prod
• Environment: prod
• App-of-apps pattern
• Points to overlays/prod

📱 blueberry-root-staging
• Environment: staging
• App-of-apps pattern
• Points to overlays/staging

🏗️ blueberry-project
• Namespace: argocd
• Source repositories
• Destination clusters
• Resource restrictions

🔐 RBAC Policies
• Role bindings
• User permissions
• Service account access

🎯 Project Resources
• Allowed clusters
• Allowed namespaces
• Resource whitelist

📋 Application CRD
• apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
• kind: Application
• Defines app deployment

🏗️ AppProject CRD
• apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
• kind: AppProject
• Defines project boundaries

🔄 ApplicationSet CRD
• apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
• kind: ApplicationSet
• Multi-environment apps

📦 Repository CRD
• apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
• kind: Repository
• Git repository configs
